Hello all,

Would someone direct me to any article on using JUnit with RMI application?  
I have read some previouis messages about this topic but I haven't any idea 
on how to do it.  Do you set up the server in the setUp() method?  How to 
generate multiple clients?  Is there other unit testing framework that is 
better for this type of testing?  Any advice would be appreciated.

Thanks in advance.

Sam
